title: The New Social Media: Video Games
itunes:title: The New Social Media: Video Games
description:
Adrian Montgomery, CEO of Enthusiast Gaming, discusses brand building and networking through the video game market. Ken Monaghan, Co-Head of High Yield at Amundi US, talks markets and high-yield credit spreads. Rania Sedhom, Managing Partner of the Sedhom Law Group, discusses counterfeit goods on Amazon. Brad Dillman, Chief Economist at Cortland, discusses the housing market. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller. (Kailey Leinz fills in for Matt Miller)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
